title: Namae no Nai Kaibutsu: Kumo to Shoujo to Ryouki Satsujin
original_name: 名前のない怪物 蜘蛛と少女と猟奇殺人
sinopse:
A monster spider with the ability to take the form of whoever it eats takes cute girl's body and NTRs MC's girlfriend. At the same time, a string of murders are plaguing the town and he begins to wonder whether the murders and the spider are connected.

(Source: MU)
